full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SDONG BRGYAN GYI CHO GA RGYAL CHU BZLOG BKRA SHIS PHUN TSOGS TSE RING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,SDONG BRGYAN CHU BZLOG GI ZUR RGYAN RMAD BYUNG DE SHAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA SDONG PO BRGYAN PA'I MDO SDE LA BRTEN NAS CHU BZLOG BYA BA'I ZUR RGYAN RMAD BYUNG DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, PHYOGS MTHAR 'KHYAMS PA'I SPRANG BTZUN SNYOMS LAS PA ^NGAG GI DBANG POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BGYIS NA RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM LA PHAN SNYAM PA'I RE BAS, GLUD GTOR BSNGO BA DANG CHOS SBYIN BYA BA SOGS 'DI'I MDOS CHOG DANG, GZHAN RNAMS TSAD LDAN GYI GSUNG 'GA' LAS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG STE BSGRIGS PA'O, ,)
